body.p: provides content completion assistance when you are writing XML Schema (XSD). To configure XSD preferences, and go to Editor Content Completion XSD . The option in this preferences page allows you to define additional elements to be suggested by the Content Completion Assistant in xs:appinfo elements (in addition to the elements defined in the XML Schema).

dt.uicontrol: When in "xs:appinfo" context, also include elements declared in the schema

dlentry.dd:
You can choose between the following:
None - The Content Completion Assistant offers only the XML Schema schema information.
ISO Schematron - The Content Completion Assistant also includes ISO Schematron elements in xs:appinfo.
Schematron 1.5 - The Content Completion Assistantalso includes Schematron 1.5 elements in xs:appinfo.
Other - The Content Completion Assistant also includes elements from an XML Schema identified by a URL in xs:appinfo elements.
